group_1.narration: The employee man gave us toppings and curry roux@to give to the lady's store.
In response to that, we decided that@while it's important to find the missing truck,@it was also important that we save the store.

group_1.textCenter: So then I, Iroha, and Ui's team...
Will continue following the truck's tracks...
While our team goes around the stores@gathering extra ingredients!

group_1.textLeft: Hold on.
You can't just go barging into stores@you don't know...
...and start asking them for curry ingredients.
You'll end up being reported.

group_1.textRight: Hell no! I ain't gettin' arrested!
But...what can we do then...

group_1.textLeft: I'll call the stores beforehand,
so let's make an appointment with the lady.

group_1.narration: Yachiyo talked to the lady over the phone.
While she was delighted to hear her...@In a worried tone, she said,@"But, is that okay? How in the world will you...?@There's barely any parking spots for cars,@so that's going to be complicated..."
However, leave it to Yachiyo,@as she seemed to be able to explain it to her@while dodging the fact that we're Magical Girls.
And so the lady@called several stores in Kamihama.
Once Tsuruno's team heard,@they sprinted off in high spirits.

group_1.textRight: Gooood daaay!@We're here to pick up the ingredients!

group_1.textLeft: Ohh, it's you guys! I heard all about it!
Here, grab what you can!

group_1.textRight: Woah, there's so much...!
Yer sure generous, old man!

group_1.textLeft: When someone's in trouble,@we look after each other!

group_1.textRight: Gooood daaay! I'm here for the Shinsei store!

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing!@It's gotta be tough, but you can do it!

group_1.textRight: They're all so kind...
But...where do we even go?
Now that we're stuck in between this store and@the new one...

group_1.textLeft: We're going to have to do some steady research@on the truck's driving route.

group_1.textRight: Right, it may seem difficult, but we have to@put effort in here!
It's not like we're running, so[chara:101501:lipSynch_0]...@[wait:1.5][chara:101501:lipSynch_1][chara:101501:motion_100]Yeah, let's do our best!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, the phone. It's the lady.
Hello.

group_1.textRight: Oh, Miss Nanami?! It's awful!

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: I called every store in Kamihama,
but another truck that delivers to us...
...seemed to have gone missing too.

group_1.textLeft: ...Meaning that there's at least two trucks missing...
But this one's a CoCoIchi truck as well...?
Did you two hear that?!

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...@But, that means...
CoCoIchi is intentionally being targeted...?
But a Witch wouldn't just go after CoCoIchi, right...?
Then the only other explanation...@Is that the culprit really is a Magical Girl...?

group_1.textLeft: Now for the regular Lucky Topping Corner!
We will be introducing various CoCoIchi toppings@here every time.
And after that, we will announce the lucky forecast@of the day!

group_1.textRight: A brilliant plan.

group_1.textLeft: Today's guest is~@Hinano Miyako!

group_1.textRight: Good day.

group_1.textLeft: An excellent choice for a guest.
CoCoIchi can serve less rice or a sweeter roux...
...for young children as well...

group_1.textRight: [chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Hey! Don't treat me like a child!

group_1.textLeft: W-well then go ahead and reveal your favorite@topping!

group_1.textRight: You know what though, I can't just settle for one.
So it's hamburg and sausage!
Well?! Is that a great choice or what?@Everyone loves it, don't they?!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*...

group_1.textRight: Hey, the heck's with that motherly smile@you're giving me!

group_1.textLeft: (That's what comes with the children's curry...)
Now for the fortune!@If you eat them both today...
You might be able to pull yourself up the bar!

group_1.textRight: Kids seats are available too!@Stop by CoCoIchi!

group_1.textLeft: Up next is the Login Bonus Corner!
